column5: I need to have my Minnkota serviced...anyone know of a good service centre closest to Hamilton?  Thanks.
Aikmens in Mississauga. 3010 Novar Rd Mississauga, Ontario L5B 1S4   Phone: 905-277-3595
He has the best service!!!! Many other places will require you to take your motor off your boat or they won't even look at it. He also fixes reels...
aikmens....?????....really.....he almost ruined a fishing trip for me last year!!!....and good man Rocky out of orillia saved me!!
Thanks folks...looks like I'll be making a trip to Aikmans.
